item-descriptions.pickaxe: A pickaxe. It can be used to mine ore. Or to stab enemies.
item-descriptions.power-armor: A power armor that the Steel Rangers usually wear. Probably the most protective kind of gear you'll ever find in the wastes. It's pretty damn heavy, but the weight is compensated for by increasing the strength of its wearer, while protecting it of magical radiations.
item-descriptions.skill-book-medicine: A book to learn more about first-aid.
item-descriptions.skill-book-outdoorsman: A book about the outdoors, with many insights on how to set camp and travel safely across the wilderness.
item-descriptions.skill-book-smallGuns: A Gun's and Bullet magazine, full of tips on proper gun use and maintenance.
item-descriptions.sparkle-cola: A carrot-flavored carbonated soft drink. Sparkle Cola used to be the most popular beverage in Equestria, prior to and during the Great War.
item-descriptions.stable-suit: Your everyday standard stable suit, issued by Stable Tech.
item-descriptions.trialKey: The key to the Cavern of Trials. It used to belong to Trial Blister. Now it's yours.
item-descriptions.trialStartKey: A rusty key found deep in the cavern of trials.

junkville-stabletech.rathian-firstroom: Alright. I've opened the other outside door. I must stay here to keep it opeend. You must go through the other door and activate the terminal in the next room. Move quickly, the turrets out there will shoot on sight.
junkville-stabletech.rathian-head-downstairs: Well done ! Come on, let's head downstairs !

medicine-skill.in-combat: You can't use medicine during combat
medicine-skill.max-use-reached: {{target}}'s wounds have already received treatment and can't be healed anymore right now.
medicine-skill.used-on: {{user}} used medicine on {{target}} and healed it for {{hp}} hit points.

messages.cannot-sneak: You cannot sneak in plain sight.
messages.door-broken: You critically failed and broke the lock
messages.door-close-first: You must close the door before locking it.
messages.door-locked-failed: You failed to lock the door
messages.door-unlocked-failed: You failed to unlock the door
messages.drunk-pass-out: You've had too much alcohol and passed out like a wreck.
messages.encounter-prompt: Do you wish to check it out ?
messages.explosive-critical-failure: You failed miserably and triggered the device !
messages.jail-sentence: You've been sentenced to {{duration}} day(s) in jail.
messages.killed: You killed {{victimName}} and earned {{xp}} experience points.
messages.poison-damage: You take {{damage}} points of damage from the poisoning.
messages.radiation-begin: You've been irradiated by magical waste.
messages.read-long-book: You get really absorbed into this book. You lost track of time, but damn was it worth it !
messages.read-old-book: You skim through this book you're already familiar with.
messages.read-skillbook: You learned more about {{skillName}} and gained {{points}} skill points.
messages.read-spellbook: You read a spellbook and learn {{spell}}.
messages.spellcast-critical-failure: {{character}} horribly failed to cast a spell.
messages.spellcast-exhausted: You've casted more spells than you could handle. You need a rest.
messages.spellcast-fail: {{character}} failed to cast a spell and took {{damage}} damage.
messages.trap-critical-failure: You critically failed and triggered the trap.
messages.trap-disarm-failed: You didn't manage to disarm the trap.
messages.use-skill-does-nothing: You use {{skillName}} on {{target}}. It does nothing.
messages.wont-barter: This person doesn't want to barter with you.

catch-robber.description: The hostel's director asked you to bring him the thief that steals from customers at night.

director-scene.part1: Ah, such a pleasure making your aquaintance ! At long last we'll put an end to that situation.
director-scene.part10: Oh, no, we can't have that here. Bobo ?
director-scene.part12: Last chance. I really don't like seeing you in that sorry state. Please give me one good reason not to kill you.
director-scene.part14: What a pity. Very well. Bobo, please rid me of that pest.
director-scene.part2: My personal told me you've stolen quite a sum to our establishment. I'll go straight to the point.
director-scene.part3: What have you done with your gains ? And how do you plan on making up to me ?
director-scene.part4: [spits] I have nothing to tell you. Do what you have to do.
director-scene.part5: Very well. Bobo, it's your time to act.
director-scene.part8: So, how do you do ? Are you gonna talk ?

catch-robber.title: Catch a thief

fetchGemstones.description: You've crossed path with a diamond dog. He asked you to help him gather gemstones, and you accepted. He also lent you the tools you'll need to do the deed. Let's pick up that pickaxe and start mining !
fetchGemstones.objective-give: Bring gemstones to your new diamond dog buddy.
fetchGemstones.objective-mine: Use a pickaxe to mine gemstones in the cavern.
fetchGemstones.title: Gemstones to diamond dog

sampleTownButter.description: The baker needs butter to bake cakes. It seems like the hostel's kitchen hoards a lot of the available ingredients around town.
sampleTownButter.give-butter: You gave butter to the baker.
sampleTownButter.title: Help the baker bake

tutorial.description:
You find yourself lost and trapped in the depth of a dark cavern. Resisting the pain of a considerable headache, you have no recollection of how you've gotten here.

The cold and damp air displeases you greatly... how about looking for an exit, and get back to the gracious sky of Equestria ?
tutorial.description-completed: You defeated Trial Blister, one way or another, and access to the outside world was granted to you.
tutorial.description-with-trial: In you search for an exit, you've met Trial Blister. It seems like you were dumped in this cavern as a trial to check your abilities to survive in the desolated land of Equestria. Trial Blister is the last challenge you must overcome to reach the outside world.
tutorial.exit-cavern-success: For completing tutorial, you gained {{xp}} experience points.
tutorial.last-trial-success: For surviving all the trials of the tutorial, you gained {{xp}} experience points.
tutorial.leave-first-room: Find a way to go through the first door.
tutorial.leave-first-room-success: For successfully exiting the first room, you've gained {{xp}} experience points.
tutorial.title: Tutorial
tutorial.win-first-fight-success: For winning your first fight, you've gained {{xp}} experience points.

sample-city.director-at-lunch: Boss is taking her launch. Come back in a couple hours.
sample-city.director-not-receiving: Boss isn't receiving anyone right now. Come back later.

rathian-meeting.leaderReaction: What ? You seem vastly outnumbered, new guy. I suggest you drop the gun and join our pretty little pony over here.
rathian-meeting.leaderReaction2#1: Oh, my ! You almost had me shitting myself just now !
rathian-meeting.leaderReaction2#2: Alright boys. Kill him. I'll take care of our pretty little pony over here.
rathian-meeting.playerEscaping: He's trying to run ! Catch him !
rathian-meeting.rathianArrival: Nopony moves ! Leave this poor fellow alone and nopony gets hurt.
rathian-meeting.rathianAttack: Get behind me ! I'll take care of these evildoers !
rathian-meeting.rathianResponds: Come on... I'm giving you a chance to make it out alive. Leave that pony alone and go away.
rathian-meeting.startAmbush#1: Hello there ! Looks like you're surrounded, friend !
rathian-meeting.startAmbush#2: Oh don't look so distraught, we ain't going to kill you... not unless you do anything stupid.
rathian-meeting.startAmbush#3: You're in luck. Look at you, all dapper and healthy ! You'll fetch us a nice price at the slave market. How about it ?
